dict.string: If a newspaper wrote about it, this would be the headline. Think sexy, sensational.
A tangible description, no longer than one sentence.
Get specific. Again, only one sentence.
This is what sets it apart from anything else on earth.
Very clear accounting of the mechanics. Step through the process of using it, including the payoff for the user.
Our motivation: fun, fame, fortune, philanthropy...
A mini-marketing plan, including free and paid media. For word of mouth, list the message friends tell each other.
What's the potential size of the market?
If everybody who could use our product used it, we'd make this many sales.
A list of competitors and things that could go wrong in a worst-case scenario.
